Package xxl.core.util.metaData

Interface Summary
ExternalTriggeredPeriodicMetaData  
MetaDataComposition<I>  
MetaDataHandler<M>  
MetaDataManageable<I,M>  
MetaDataManagement<I,M>  
MetaDataProvider<M> An interface that signals that an implementing class provides meta data information.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMetaDataManagement<I,M>  
CompositeMetaData<I,M> A composite metadata provides a generic metadata object that can be used to merge different metadata object, so called metadata fragments, to a single one that can be handled by the getMetaData method of the interface MetaDataProvider.
CostModelMetaDataIdentifiers  
MetaDataProviders The class MetaDataProviders contains various static methods for accessing the metadata of a metadata provider.
TransparentCompositeMetaData<I,M> A composite metadata object that wraps another one in a transparent way.
 

Exception Summary
MetaDataException A metadata exception is thrown to indicate that an application has attempted to access a metadata object in an inappropriate way.
